text: Except as provided in subsection (e) of § 42-2704.02, all actions of the Agency shall be conducted in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.).
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-2151.

1973 Ed., § 45-1927.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.01.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-28, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-2701.02.

DC CODE § 42-2705.01

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Agency actions governed by Administrative Procedure Act.
